0.title: Trump's Trade Policies: Impact and Consequences
0.summary: This cluster examines the wide-ranging effects of President Trump's trade policies, focusing on tariffs, trade disputes with China, and the potential impact on the global economy. Key aspects include economic slowdown, legal challenges to tariffs, trade crime, effects on small businesses, and criticisms from companies. This also includes possible decoupling of US from china. Specific news points highlight the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development's assessment of economic impact, legal challenges to tariffs, renewed attacks on China, companies' challenges and the increasing possibility of trade crime due to increased tariffs.

1.title: Trump Administration's Budget Cuts and Economic Policies
1.summary: This focuses on the Trump administration's broader economic agenda. It includes details of budget cuts to education, health, housing, and labor programs. The link also includes the approach that Trump takes ignoring the economic warning signs. These policies will likely have profound impacts on small businesses.

2.title: US - China Technological Relationship Under Trump Administration
2.summary: This cluster focuses on the technological side of the US - China relationship under the Trump Administration. This includes pausing exports of airplane and semiconductor technologies to China. Also, the discussion of selling chips to countries such as U.A.E and Saudi Arabia.

3.title: The gold conspiracies of Trump Administration
3.summary: This clusters focuses on the gold conspiracies that Trump administration implies. There is a unclear reason as to why President Trump implies the conspiracies of US gold being stolen. But gold investment companies endorse the idea to cash in.
